covered: Successful update of account with minimal required fields

Update with treatNullAsReset true and null fields in body
Update with treatNullAsReset false and null fields in body

Regression - previously fixed issue: updating email field does not overwrite other fields
Integration - update propagates to dependent services
Performance - concurrent updates to the same account

gaps: No explicit tests for authorization beyond missing header (e.g., invalid tokens)
No tests for pagination handling in large datasets
No tests for rate limiting or throttling
No scenarios explicitly testing caching headers or behaviors
No tests for handling malformed or unsupported query parameters beyond extraParam
No explicit concurrency race condition tests beyond performance scenario
No tests for soft delete behaviors or data recovery
recommendations: Add explicit tests for authorization failures, such as invalid or expired tokens
Include tests for pagination when updating large datasets or multiple accounts
Implement rate limiting and throttling tests to verify system robustness under load
Add scenarios to verify caching headers like ETag and Cache-Control for responses
Test handling of malformed or unsupported query parameters more thoroughly
Create dedicated concurrency tests to simulate race conditions and ensure data consistency
Include tests for soft delete or recovery behaviors if applicable
